snippet: Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin he would sign a ban on abortions after 20 weeks, coming out strongly on an issue important to social conservatives that he played sown during his re-election campaign last year.
abstract: Gov. Scott Walker of Wisconsin he would sign a ban on abortions after 20 weeks, coming out strongly on an issue important to social conservatives that he played sown during his re-election campaign last year.

headline.main: Scott Walker Says He Would Sign Ban on Abortions After 20 Weeks
